mapper.select: SELECT product.*, shoppingcart.* FROM shoppingcart INNER JOIN product ON shoppingcart.pid = product.pid AND shoppingcart.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY cartbytime DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shoppingcart (uid, pid, numbers, priceall, cartbytime) VALUES (#{uid}, #{pid}, #{numbers}, #{priceall}, #{cartbytime})
